```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.width=8, fig.height=6}
library(plotly)
library(readr)
library(stringr)
raw_k <- read_csv("Ankara_KİRALIK.csv")
raw_k$Price <- as.numeric(gsub("\\.", "", str_extract(raw_k$Price, "^[^\n]+")))
raw_k$Size <- as.numeric(str_extract(raw_k$Size, "\\d+"))
raw_s <- read_csv("Ankara_Satılık.csv")
raw_s$Price <- as.numeric(gsub("\\.", "", str_extract(raw_s$Price, "^[^\n]+")))
raw_s$Size <- as.numeric(str_extract(raw_s$Size, "\\d+"))
```

## Districts

### Altındağ {.tabset .tabset-pills}

#### Rental

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.width=8, fig.height=6}
ilce <- 'altindag'
df <- raw_k[raw_k$Province == ilce, ]
df <- df[df$Price>= 500 & df$Price <= 300000,]
df <- df[df$Size>= 30 & df$Size <= 1500,]
fig <- plot_ly(data = df, x = ~Size, y = ~Price)
fig <- fig %>% layout(xaxis = list(title = 'Size, m²'), yaxis = list(title = 'Price, TRY'))

fig <- fig %>%
  add_trace(
    marker = list(color='green'),
    hoverinfo = 'y',
    showlegend = F
  ) 
fig
```

#### Sale 

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.width=8, fig.height=6}
ilce <- 'altindag'
df1 <- raw_s[raw_s$Province == ilce, ]
df1 <- df1[df1$Price >= 500000 & df1$Price <= 6000000, ]  # Fix the typo here
df1 <- df1[df1$Size >= 30 & df1$Size <= 1500, ]
fig1 <- plot_ly(data = df1, x = ~Size, y = ~Price)
fig1 <- fig1 %>% layout(xaxis = list(title = 'Size, m²'), yaxis = list(title = 'Price, TRY'))

fig1 <- fig1 %>%
  add_trace(
    marker = list(color='red'),
    hoverinfo = 'y',
    showlegend = F
  ) 
fig1
```
